backend/main.mo: Actor managing access control, user approval, invite-only mode, and per-user profiles.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature changes, affected files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of all major frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document loading the React app root and main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app with router setup, theme provider, AuthGate, and global error fallback.
frontend/src/components/apa/ApaBallButto: Button component for APA balls showing number, state-based styling, and accessible labels.
frontend/src/components/apa/apaBallStyle: Defines ball scoring helpers including ball values, state labels, and rack total calculations.
frontend/src/components/apa/ApaRackScori: Manages rack scoring UI for APA 9-ball, including ball states, innings, defensive shots, auto-dead logic, and live updates.
frontend/src/components/apa/ApaResultsSu: Displays final match results with player stats, points, innings, defensive shots, and match point outcomes.
frontend/src/components/apa/RealApaMatch: Provides a form for creating or editing official APA match logs with validation, connection handling, and save/update actions.
frontend/src/components/apa/useApaInning: Hook that manages inning flow logic, active player turns, shared innings, and reset behavior for APA racks.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Gates app access based on authentication, approval, admin status, and invite-only mode, showing login or restriction screens as needed.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button that manages Internet Identity auth and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog for creating or editing a user profile, handling form state, validation, and saving via backend hooks.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main app layout with header, navigation, footer, login controls, and profile setup/edit dialogs.
frontend/src/components/matches/DeleteMa: Button with confirmation dialog to delete a match and optionally navigate or trigger a callback.
frontend/src/components/matches/EndMatch: Dialog to confirm ending and saving a match session with async handling and error reporting.
frontend/src/components/matches/MatchSum: Card displaying a match summary, including mode, date, players, and outcome details.
frontend/src/components/navigation/ModeC: Clickable card that displays a game mode and navigates to start a new match.
frontend/src/components/players/ApaAggre: Charts showing APA performance trends using computed PPI and match result series with rolling averages.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that initializes and manages the authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorRetry.ts: Hook providing a function to clear and refetch the actor query to retry backend connection.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, exposing identity, login, logout, and status helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating match data and user profiles through an actor-based backend API.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind CSS base styles and sets light/dark theme CSS variables for colors and layout.
frontend/src/lib/accepting-gifts/accepti: Implements state transitions for an "accepting gifts" game mode, including scoring updates and set progression.
frontend/src/lib/apa/apaAggregateStats.t: Extracts APA match data points and win-rate statistics from match history, including practice and official logs.
frontend/src/lib/apa/apaEqualizer.ts: Defines APA skill levels and point targets, with helpers for validation and formatting.
frontend/src/lib/apa/apaMatchPoints.ts: Provides APA 9-ball match point conversion charts and types for determining match-point outcomes based on loser SL and points.
frontend/src/lib/apa/apaPracticeMatchOut: Computes APA practice match outcomes by determining the winner, applying the match-point chart, and returning structured results.
frontend/src/lib/apa/apaScoring.ts: Defines interfaces and helpers for APA 9-ball rack scoring, validation, and PPI/stat calculations.
Computes official APA match outcomes based on skill levels and scores, with helpers for fallback outcome resolution.
frontend/src/lib/apa/officialApaPpi.ts: Parses inputs and calculates official APA PPI using score divided by innings minus defensive shots, with formatting utilities.
frontend/src/lib/matches/effectiveMatchD: Parses user-entered dates and derives an effective match timestamp for sorting and display.
frontend/src/lib/matches/matchBuilders.t: Builds official APA match log records, deriving win/loss when possible and delegating other builders to the original file.
frontend/src/lib/matches/matchBuildersOr: Implements builders for APA practice, Accepting Gifts, and Straight Shot match records with detailed stats.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/accepting-gifts/Accep: Runs the active Accepting Gifts drill, loading and persisting game state, handling attempts and set transitions, and syncing baseline counts to the backend.
Displays the rules, scoring, progression, and tips for the Accepting Gifts drill.
Configures and starts a new Accepting Gifts session, managing player info, baseline ball count, and session initialization.
Runs the APA practice match flow, handling rack scoring, state persistence, match completion, and saving results.
frontend/src/pages/apa/PracticeStartPage: Collects player names and skill levels, prevents duplicates, computes race targets, and initializes a new APA practice session.
frontend/src/pages/apa/RealApaMatchEditP: Loads an existing official APA match log for editing and passes the data into the form, redirecting if the match is missing.
frontend/src/pages/apa/RealApaMatchPlace: Provides a form for creating a new official APA match log manually after the match.
frontend/src/pages/auth/AccessNotAllowed: Displays an invite‑only access block and lets the user request approval, showing confirmation once submitted.
frontend/src/pages/history/MatchDetailsP: Loads and displays detailed match information with APA‑specific stats and navigation controls.
frontend/src/pages/history/MatchHistoryP: Shows a sortable, filterable list of past matches grouped by mode with navigation back to home.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the home page with navigation cards for match modes and a link to match history.
frontend/src/pages/owner/OwnerApprovalsP: Admin page for managing user approvals and invite‑only mode, including approving, rejecting, and bulk actions.
frontend/src/pages/players/PlayerAggrega: Aggregates and displays APA player statistics, including win rates, PPI averages, and match breakdowns.
frontend/src/pages/SmokeCheckPage.tsx: Provides a deployment verification page with navigation tests to Home and Match History.
frontend/src/pages/straight-shot/Straigh: Handles straight‑shot game state, persistence, and saving match results, with UI for editing shots and ending the game.
Displays the rules, objectives, and win conditions for the Straight Shot drill using a card layout.
Renders the start page for the Straight Shot drill with player inputs, rules toggle, moving average calculation, and navigation to the game.
frontend/src/utils/errorText.ts: Provides a helper to extract a readable error message from various error shapes, including nested objects.
frontend/src/utils/playerName.ts: Contains utilities to normalize and compare player names case‑insensitively.
frontend/src/utils/playerRoutes.ts: Generates the route path for a player's stats page using URL encoding.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and persisting URL parameters and session parameters.
frontend/src/utils/withTimeout.ts: Wraps a promise with a timeout and rejects with a custom error if exceeded.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme, plugins, colors, typography, and custom animations.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s current state, goals, architectural notes, and known issues for the pool practice app.
